sentences.en: Our apartment building's contiguity to a supermarket is very convenient.
sentences.cn: 我们的公寓和超级市场相邻,购物相当方便.

sentences.en: Scientists want to investigate the relation between xerophthalmia occurrence and smut contiguity.
sentences.cn: 科学家们打算探讨干眼症与煤尘接触之间的关系.

sentences.en: Taking into consideration of their contiguity to China.
sentences.cn: 考虑到他们与中国相邻.

sentences.en: The contiguity of the house and the garage was a convenience in bad weather.
sentences.cn: 房屋与车房的接近在坏天气时是一项便利.

trans.tran_cn: 接近，一连串的事物，一系列，一大片
